data.name: Gems of Magic: Lost Family
data.detailed_description:
Peaceful and really magical Match 3 adventure for a whole family!

This magic and beautiful game allow you to take a look at Enchanted Forest, were many magical creatures live peacefully. But now Magic creatures were in trouble. Hurricane took the Fuzzy family and he must find them! Can you help the magic creature to save his family in this incredible adventure?

The bright game without violence, quite simple on start, but challenge after first levels! Suitable for kids and adults to relax and spent some time

Unique boosters
A magic enemy, which try to block you during play
Beautiful hand-drawn graphics
The enchanted atmosphere of a magic tale world
90 challenging levels.
Magic, absorbing soundtrack
Suitable for kids

This magic and beautiful game allow you to take a look at Enchanted Forest, were many magical creatures live peacefully. The bright game without violence, quite simple on start, but challenge after first levels! Suitable for kids and adults.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.0 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.0 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Sound Card: any
